reuters.title:
PHILLIPS PETROLEUM

RAISES CRUDE POSTINGS
reuters.body: Phillips Petroleum Co said it raised its crude oil posted prices for West Texas Intermediate and West Texas Sour by 50 cts a barrel, effective June 17. The company said the new posted price for WTI and WTS is 19 dlrs a barrel. The increase is in reaction to Sun Co raising postings similarly yesterday. Reuter 
